item.description:
Now that the governor's ban is lifted, its time to get out tomorrow to the Great Carlisle trails for what sounds like is going to be a gorgeous ski day - sunny mid 30s, just 5-10mph winds.

A small group of us from "AMC Boston Ski & Ride" are meeting tomorrow morning at 9:30AM. Join us if you would like. ALL abilities Welcome! 

I know the trails VERY well, and plan to try and scoop up a picnic table inside the barn so we can gather and discuss trail ideas, plans,.... and partner/group by abilities, experience, speed. 

Bring lunch/snack, water, CASH!

We can eat out on the trails, or re-group in the barn/lodge for lunch.

Trail passes $12 CASH ONLY! * touring center doesn't take CREDIT cards.

Rentals available for $13

* I suspect the touring center to be pretty crowded so I will email my cell# to all that rsvp "YES" should you have trouble locating me/us or would like to meetup later in the day.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing blue "Mont Ste-Anne Quebec" headband. blue jacket, blue pants

group.name: The Boston Cross-Country Skiing and Snowshoe Meetup Group

item.name: Sunday at Great Brook Ski Touring Center
